forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 10 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the shadows stretch across the city, Downtown San Francisco embraces a quiet evening, marked by a lingering hint of moisture in the air. While hints of drizzle may tease the streets later on, tonight promises a predominantly cloudy canvas overhead, with temperatures settling into the comfortable murmur of 59 degrees. A cool west-southwest wind ensures that the dampness is brisk, whisking away any stifling warmth and reminding us that the Bay Area wears its unpredictability with pride.

Dawn will coax a slight chance of morning drizzle from the clouds, giving way to a clearer midday reveal. As the sun peeks through the veil, the day warms gently to a modest high near 67. Although the afternoon may lead to a tempered 65, the sun's embrace will be felt, tantalizing the soul with the promise of some elusive warmth. Dress lightly yet sensibly; a light jacket will serve you well against the wind's playful gusts as it weaves through the bustling streets and hidden alleyways. Given these variable yet inviting conditions, perhaps a stroll along the waterfront—taking in the natural rhythm of the waves and watching as the city shakes off the tendrils of fog—would be a delightful way to spend the day. As dusk settles, consider finding a cozy nook at a local café, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with stories of the city's vibrant heartbeat.
